Overview
Overview / Product overview / System objects / Service policies / Time zones
Time zones
The service policy specifies the time zone where jobs are printed. If jobs are printed in more than one time zone, you must create a service policy
for each time zone.
For example, if jobs are printed in the US/Eastern time zone and the US/Mountain time zone, you must create two service policies, one for each
time zone. These service policies can be exactly the same except for the name of the service policy and the time zone.
Parent topic: Service policies
